text: Strawberries are a critical FL crop. Thiram is a fungicide that ensures a strong crop. @EPA proposed a ban on Thiram w/conflicting data. I led a letter w/ @RepDarrenSoto urging @EPA to reconsider. We need ALL data before such an economically devastating decision is finalized.
